alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Hocking; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 30 at 3:19PM EDT until March 31 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Licking, Fairfield and Hocking Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind gusts to 45 mph will be possible into early evening, before winds decrease after sunset. However, even stronger gusts are possible after midnight, both inside and outside of showers moving through the area. Some gusts up to or in excess of 50 mph will be possible between 12 AM and 6 AM EDT.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
